Articles.Content:
THIS IS MY LOG OF EXPLO-eXTRATERRES-EXTRAORDINARY MISSIONS (AND BAD ONES TOO), THE FULL REPORTS COME SOON (tM)

Mission one: Kraken's Demise Mun trip

Hyperedited to 100000 m above Kerbin, then did a legit trip and circulation of Orbit of the Mun 

Mission Two: KERBKOM, UFO DEFENCE

UFO 1 was detected. Aries 3A was armed and Refitted to tango with it. The UFO Was Kerbal, however Extraterrestrial. Interceptor I managed to shoot down the thing. 

PS: (Is it bad that I listened to the PSX XCOM UFO Defence Dogfight song as i wrote this)
